name: Space floating太空飘着
detailed_description:
I play this game for the money behind the game, only to get more money to make good with the game.
"Space floating Space Floating" is a control power, control the direction of the game,
You use the left mouse button to control the power, move the mouse to control the direction.
Blocking in space, you have to avoid it, hit back will be bounced back.
Everyone's feelings are different, what do you feel I do not know.
about_the_game:
I play this game for the money behind the game, only to get more money to make good with the game.
"Space floating Space Floating" is a control power, control the direction of the game,
You use the left mouse button to control the power, move the mouse to control the direction.

Everyone's feelings are different, what do you feel I do not know.
short_description: I am floating in space, alive because of the light of tomorrow, for tomorrow I will have to survive.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
